entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
